paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician, A Psalm of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician, A Psalm of David.

paragraphs.content: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.

paragraphs.content: Day unto day uttereth speech, and night unto night sheweth knowledge.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Day unto day uttereth speech, and night unto night sheweth knowledge.

paragraphs.content: There is no speech nor language, where their voice is not heard.
paragraphs.contentHtml: There is no speech nor language, where their voice is not heard.

paragraphs.content: Their line is gone out through all the earth, and their words to the end of the world. In them hath he set a tabernacle for the sun,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Their line is gone out through all the earth, and their words to the end of the world. In them hath he set a tabernacle for the sun,

paragraphs.content: Which is as a bridegroom coming out of his chamber, and rejoiceth as a strong man to run a race.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Which is as a bridegroom coming out of his chamber, and rejoiceth as a strong man to run a race.

paragraphs.content: His going forth is from the end of the heaven, and his circuit unto the ends of it: and there is nothing hid from the heat thereof.
paragraphs.contentHtml: His going forth is from the end of the heaven, and his circuit unto the ends of it: and there is nothing hid from the heat thereof.

paragraphs.content: The law of the LORD is perfect, converting the soul: the testimony of the LORD is sure, making wise the simple.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The law of the Lord is perfect, converting the soul: the testimony of the Lord is sure, making wise the simple.

paragraphs.content: The statutes of the LORD are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the LORD is pure, enlightening the eyes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The statutes of the Lord are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the Lord is pure, enlightening the eyes.

paragraphs.content: The fear of the LORD is clean, enduring for ever: the judgments of the LORD are true and righteous altogether.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The fear of the Lord is clean, enduring for ever: the judgments of the Lord are true and righteous altogether.

paragraphs.content: More to be desired are they than gold, yea, than much fine gold: sweeter also than honey and the honeycomb.
paragraphs.contentHtml: More to be desired are they than gold, yea, than much fine gold: sweeter also than honey and the honeycomb.

paragraphs.content: Moreover by them is thy servant warned: and in keeping of them there is great reward.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Moreover by them is thy servant warned: and in keeping of them there is great reward.

paragraphs.content: Who can understand his errors? cleanse thou me from secret faults.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who can understand his errors? cleanse thou me from secret faults.

paragraphs.content: Keep back thy servant also from presumptuous sins; let them not have dominion over me: then shall I be upright, and I shall be innocent from the great transgression.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Keep back thy servant also from presumptuous sins; let them not have dominion over me: then shall I be upright, and I shall be innocent from the great transgression.

paragraphs.content: Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of my heart, be acceptable in thy sight, O LORD, my strength, and my redeemer.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of my heart, be acceptable in thy sight, O Lord, my strength, and my redeemer.
